titles.title: To allow Members of Congress to carry a concealed handgun anywhere in the United States, with exceptions.
To allow Members of Congress to carry a concealed handgun anywhere in the United States, with exceptions.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on House Administration, and Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
